data.price: نو بېشکه له سختۍ سره آسانتيا هم شته.
بېشکه چې له سختۍ سره آساني هم شته.

dua.name: Dua for Protection from Anxiety
dua.significanceReason: Promises divine relief after difficulty, offering hope and comfort to those experiencing mental and emotional challenges.

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.
